physical_appearance: This is a grey cheongsam with very short sleeves. There is a collar present as well. A zipper runs down the left side of the cheongsam where the slit is located at. The cheongsam does not look worn out and there are no visible tears on it. There are floral patterns all over the cheongsam.
sgcool_label_text: This is a grey laced cheongsam with capped sleeves and floral motifs which was possibly worn for occasions.
subject_terms_2: Qipao Ethnic costume Motifs Women's clothing
